143557.「どの装備の どの錬金効果を\n 強化させたいかの？\n<break>:
Which equipment's alchemy effects do you
want to enhance?
<break>

143558.「ほう…… <%sL_MAT_ITEM>を <%dL_NUM>個 使って\n <:
I see... so you want to use <%dL_NUM> <%sL_MAT_ITEM>s
to enhance the <%sL_RENKIN_BEFORE> effect
to <%sL_RENKIN_AFTER>
<yesno 2><break>

143559.「お前の持つ 装備品を\n 救ってやれるのは お前自身だけだ。\n それを 忘れ:
Only you can save yourself with the equipment
you have. Don't forget that.

143560.「なに やめるのか？\n こいつに 期待させておいて……\n お前も 罪な奴だ。:
What, are you quitting? You let him get his
hopes up... You're guilty, too.

143562.「悪いが この錬金効果は 強化できない。\n 別の効果に してくれ。:
I'm sorry, but this alchemy effect cannot be
enhanced. Please choose a different effect.

143563.「この装備についている 錬金効果は\n もう これ以上 強化できないようだ。\n:
The alchemy effects currently on this piece of
equipment cannot be enhanced any further.
You're lucky!

143564.「この効果を強化するのに 必要な\n <%sL_MAT_ITEM>の数が 足らな:
I'll need more <%sL_MAT_ITEM>s to
enhance this effect. Without those, I sadly
can't help you.

143565.「この錬金効果は もう強化できないぞ。\n これ以上 強化すれば こいつの負担に:
This effect cannot be enhanced any further.
If I did, it'd be too much for you to handle.
So, I can't do it.

143566.「……残念だが お前の持つ 装備品には\n 錬金強化できるものが ひとつもない。:
... I'm afraid there's only one piece of equipment in your possession that can be enhanced by alchemy... I'm sorry, but you'll
have to come back...

143567.「錬金石という素材を 持ってくれば\n お前が装備したことのある レベル85以上:
If you bring me a material called an alchemy stone, I can enhance the alchemical effects of any piece of equipment you've ever
equipped that's at least level 85. There are several types of smelting stones, but if you don't have the right one for your
equipment... Equipment has its own chemistry. There are some things that can't be enhanced. And there are some things that can't be
enhanced... And there are some things that can't be enhanced... like equipment that can still have alchemical effects... or effects
that can only be applied in Pulpunkt. I'm sorry, but I can't save every piece of equipment. I understand that...

143570.<%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM>に ついていた\n<%sL_REN:
<%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM>'s <%sL_RENKIN_BEFORE>
effect has been enhanced to
<%sL_RENKIN_AFTER>!
<se_nots System 7>

143572.「他に 用は あるか？\n<break>: Is there anything else you need?<break>

143573.「錬金効果を 強化するのか？\n<break>:
Want to enhance your alchemy effects?
<break>

143575.「初めて見る顔だな。\n 聞こえるぞ…… お前の持つ\n 装備品たちの 嘆きの声:
I've never seen... I can hear it... The wailing of your equipment. They lament that their full potential could be realized if
only a better alchemy could be applied. It's a shame. But rest assured... In order to save such equipment I've created a technique to
enhance the alchemy effect. If you bring me a material called an alchemy stone I can enhance the alchemical effects of any piece
of equipment you've ever equipped that's at least level 85. There are several types of smelting stones, but if you don't have the
right stone for your equipment... Equipment has its own chemistry. There are some things that can't be enhanced. And there are some
things that can't be enhanced... And there are some things that can't be enhanced... like equipment that can still have alchemical
effects... or effects that can only be applied in Pulpunkt. I'm sorry, but I can't save every piece of equipment. I understand
that... Now...

143635.「この装備の効果 <%sL_RENKIN>は\n 今は <%nL_NOW_STE:
This equipment's <%sL_RENKIN> effect is
currently at level <%dL_NOW_STEP_NUM>. It can be enhanced
up to level <%dL_MAX_STEP_NUM>.

144087.「<%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM>の\n どの錬金効果を 強化させ:
Which of the <%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM>'s
alchemy effects do you want to enhance?
<break>

144088.「どの装備を 強化させたいんだ？\n<break>:
Which piece of equipment do you want to
enhance?<break>

144089.「<%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM>は\n ロックされているが\n:
<%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM> is locked, do you
want to reinforce it regardless?<yesno 2><break>

144289.「おいおい まっさらの新品じゃないか。\n こいつはまだ 装備品にすら なりきれ:
Oh, come on. It's brand-new. This thing isn't
even fully equipped yet. I'll have to equip
it first before I can alchemize it...<bw_break>

144864.「おいおい こいつは まだ\n 錬金効果を つけられるじゃないか。\n<br>\:
This thing still has alchemy on it. With my technology I can only help you with equipment that has the last alchemical effect. I'm
sorry, but I understand that...
